text:
[Verse]
Golden skies soft whisper
Chasing light in twilight
Dreams we hold and remember
In the glow of night

[Verse 2]
City lights start to shimmer
Stars begin their flight
Moments fade never dimmer
Dancing through the night

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams simple schemes
Capture hearts and fly
Endless streams perfect themes
In the open sky

[Verse 3]
Footsteps lost on the sand
Waves that kiss the shore
Hand in hand take a stand
Wanting nothing more

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams simple schemes
Capture hearts and fly
Endless streams perfect themes
In the open sky

[Bridge]
Shadows grow conversations slow
Whispers turn to sighs
In the glow hearts will show
Under twilight skies
title: Sunset Dreams
